doc.previous: London 2012 are the first Olympic Games whose guidelines include the recycling of PVC.[122]
after: The Olympic Charter, the set of rules and guidelines for the organization of the Olympic Games and for governing the Olympic Movement, states that
The Cultural Olympiad comprises many programmes, with over 500 events spread over four years across the whole of the United Kingdom, and culminating in the London 2012 Festival.[124][125]
